prompt: Design a privacy policy page with a soft pink background for a friendly, approachable vibe. Place a 'Privacy Policy' title at the top in a large, bold deep pink font, aligned to the left. Include a back button in the top-right corner with a deep pink icon. Below the title, add a brief introductory paragraph in dark gray text. Create four sections with subheadings ('Data We Collect', 'How We Use Data', 'Data Protection', 'Get in Touch') in bold deep pink text, each followed by a paragraph in dark gray text. Use 20-pixel padding and 24-pixel spacing between sections. At the bottom, place an 'Accept' button with a deep pink background and white text, and a 'Decline' button with a transparent background and deep pink border, both aligned to the right. The layout should be scrollable with a Column layout.
flutter_code:
import 'package:flutter/material.dart';

class GeneratedWidget extends StatelessWidget {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Scaffold(
      backgroundColor: Colors.pink[50],
      appBar: AppBar(
        backgroundColor: Colors.pink[50],
        elevation: 0,
        actions: [
          IconButton(
            icon: Icon(Icons.arrow_back, color: Colors.pink[900]),
            onPressed: () {},
          ),
        ],
      ),
      body: SingleChildScrollView(
        padding: EdgeInsets.all(20.0),
        child: Column(
          crossAxisAlignment: CrossAxisAlignment.start,
          children: [
            Text(
              'Privacy Policy',
              style: TextStyle(
                fontSize: 30,
                fontWeight: FontWeight.bold,
                color: Colors.pink[900],
              ),
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 16),
            Text(
              'This policy explains how we handle your data.',
              style: TextStyle(
                fontSize: 16,
                color: Colors.grey[700],
                height: 1.5,
              ),
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 24),
            Text(
              'Data We Collect',
              style: TextStyle(
                fontSize: 20,
                fontWeight: FontWeight.bold,
                color: Colors.pink[900],
              ),
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 8),
            Text(
              'We collect information like your name and email.',
              style: TextStyle(
                fontSize: 14,
                color: Colors.grey[700],
                height: 1.6,
              ),
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 24),
            Text(
              'How We Use Data',
              style: TextStyle(
                fontSize: 20,
                fontWeight: FontWeight.bold,
                color: Colors.pink[900],
              ),
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 8),
            Text(
              'Your data helps us provide better services.',
              style: TextStyle(
                fontSize: 14,
                color: Colors.grey[700],
                height: 1.6,
              ),
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 24),
            Text(
              'Data Protection',
              style: TextStyle(
                fontSize: 20,
                fontWeight: FontWeight.bold,
                color: Colors.pink[900],
              ),
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 8),
            Text(
              'We secure your data with encryption.',
              style: TextStyle(
                fontSize: 14,
                color: Colors.grey[700],
                height: 1.6,
              ),
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 24),
            Text(
              'Get in Touch',
              style: TextStyle(
                fontSize: 20,
                fontWeight: FontWeight.bold,
                color: Colors.pink[900],
              ),
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 8),
            Text(
              'Contact us at support@company.com.',
              style: TextStyle(
                fontSize: 14,
                color: Colors.grey[700],
                height: 1.6,
              ),
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 40),
            Row(
              mainAxisAlignment: MainAxisAlignment.end,
              children: [
                ElevatedButton(
                  onPressed: () {},
                  child: Text('Accept', style: TextStyle(color: Colors.white)),
                  style: ElevatedButton.styleFrom(
                    backgroundColor: Colors.pink[900],
                    padding: EdgeInsets.symmetric(horizontal: 24, vertical: 16),
                    shape: RoundedRectangleBorder(
                      borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(8),
                    ),
                  ),
                ),
                SizedBox(width: 12),
                OutlinedButton(
                  onPressed: () {},
                  child: Text('Decline', style: TextStyle(color: Colors.pink[900])),
                  style: OutlinedButton.styleFrom(
                    padding: EdgeInsets.symmetric(horizontal: 24, vertical: 16),
                    side: BorderSide(color: Colors.pink[900]),
                    shape: RoundedRectangleBorder(
                      borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(8),
                    ),
                  ),
                ),
              ],
            ),
          ],
        ),
      ),
    );
  }
}
